text: atarku avarutaiya makkalil karvam kontirunta talaivarkal, tankalaivita talntavarkalena ennik kontirunta nampikkaiyalarkalai nokki, ‘‘niccayamaka inta salih tam iraivanal anuppappatta oru tutarena ninkal urutiyaka nampukirirkala?'' Enru kettarkal. Atarkavarkal ‘‘niccayamaka nankal avar kontuvanta tutai nampikkai kolkirom'' enru kurinarkal
